# Summary of count data

```{r}
df <- data.frame(row.names = c("Number of genes", "Number of samples", "Number of NA's"),
                 Value = c(nrow(dataframe), ncol(dataframe), sum(is.na(dataframe))))

knitr::kable(df)
```
